title: 6.4.3 Implement AuthService
body:
## Parent Issue
#26 - 6.4 Basic Authentication

## Objective
Implement authentication service with register/login/refresh/logout.

## Key Methods
- register(email, password, name)
- login(email, password) -> TokenPair
- refresh(refresh_token) -> TokenPair
- logout(refresh_token)
- update_profile(user_id, name, email)
- change_password(user_id, old_password, new_password)

## Files to Create
- `src/cloud_optimizer/services/auth.py`

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Registration checks duplicate email
- [ ] Login validates credentials
- [ ] Refresh reuses refresh token
- [ ] Logout revokes session
- [ ] Password change requires old password

## Estimated Time
2.5 hours
